author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Does Adam Savage remember filming the Killer Whirlpool episode, and which myth was the most frustrating for him? Were the colors used in MythBusters builds practical or artistic? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these MythBusters-related questions from Tested members Remy M, Sigmund Horn and SHarrington9614, whom we thank for their support. Which myth looked the most miserable to you?

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join
The MythBusters Episode Adam Savage Regrets Making: https://youtu.be/0y2fDrv47U4
This Myth Generated the Most Personal Backlash Against Adam and Jamie: https://youtu.be/XrBzjqroSHY
More MythBusters-Related videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8vTHbqHT9Y&list=PLJtitKU0CAehaZdgrPRzjyGFSEQ8URiQl

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
Tested and Adam Savage
title: This Myth Made Adam Savage Violently Ill
